Title: Face to Face
Production_Co: Cinematograph AB, Dino de Laurentiis Cinematografica, Sveriges Radio
Cast: Liv Ullmann, Erland Josephson, Aino Taube, Gunnar Björnstrand, Kristina Adolphson, Marianne Aminoff, Gösta Ekman, Helene Friberg, Ulf Johansson, Sven Lindberg, Jan-Erik Lindqvist, Birger Malmsten, Sif Ruud, Göran Stangertz, Mona Andersson
Plot: A sensitive exploration of the tragic irony of the psychiatrist suffering with mental illness. Dr. Jenny Isaksson is a psychiatrist married to another psychiatrist; both are successful in ... See full summary » A sensitive exploration of the tragic irony of the psychiatrist suffering with mental illness. Dr. Jenny Isaksson is a psychiatrist married to another psychiatrist; both are successful in their jobs but slowly, agonizingly, she succumbs to a breakdown. Jenny is haunted by images and emotions from her past and eventually cannot function, either as a wife, a doctor or as an individual. Written by Sujit R. Varma
Keywords: psychiatrist, suicide attempt, hallucination, dream, rape
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 7 wins & 3 nominations.
Location: Filmhusateljéerna, Filmhuset, Svenska Filminstitutet, Gärdet, Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden
Actors: Liv Ullmann, Erland Josephson, Aino Taube
Description: Directed by Ingmar Bergman.  With Liv Ullmann, Erland Josephson, Aino Taube, Gunnar Björnstrand. A sensitive exploration of the tragic irony of the psychiatrist suffering with mental illness. Dr. Jenny Isaksson is a psychiatrist married to another psychiatrist; both are successful in their jobs but slowly, agonizingly, she succumbs to a breakdown. Jenny is haunted by images and emotions from her past and eventually cannot function, either as a wife, a doctor or as an individual.
